item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/04/11/heartbleed-explanation-xkcd/#comment-4194">JimV</a>.
I've read these two https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2014/04/bleeding-hearts-club-heartbleed-recovery-system-administrators https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2014/04/wild-heart-were-intelligence-agencies-using-heartbleed-november-2013
I think the real question is if NSA or other government entities had been using the heartbleed bug already. Unfortunately I suspect we will never know for sure.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JimV.

I’ve read these two https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2014/04/bleeding-hearts-club-heartbleed-recovery-system-administrators https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2014/04/wild-heart-were-intelligence-agencies-using-heartbleed-november-2013

I think the real question is if NSA or other government entities had been using the heartbleed bug already. Unfortunately I suspect we will never know for sure.

item.title: By: JimV
item.dc:creator: JimV
item.description: Excellent! Have you seen the EFF information on Heartbleed?
item.content:encoded: Excellent! Have you seen the EFF information on Heartbleed?
